Articles.Content:
If you ever wanted to make an interstellar probe a la Voyager, Pioneer 1x, or New Horizons, then there could be some options included as messages for the stars. I know there was an old sketch of a Kerboneer Plaque made back in 2014 which is yet to be made into an add-on, though it could be added as a flag.

The same could be done for a potential Golden Record mod, having it be just a flag to add to your mission. However, I think it would be even better if it were playable on the mission. Basically, if you played the item, then you could have a custom soundtrack for your game. If you want to listen to Dark Side of the Moon, you can do it. If you like to listen to Vocaloid, you can do it. If you want to listen to the actual contents of the real-life Golden Record, you can do it!
